title: Difference between substantive and procedural dem.

content.question: In comparing procedural and substantive democracy, it is accurate to say

choices.label: all substantive democracies are procedural, but not all procedural democracies are substantive
procedural democracies are characterized by more civil liberties than are substantive democracies
during Putinâ€™s tenure as president, democracy in Russia became increasingly substantive
liberal democracies tend to be more procedural than substantive democracies
procedural democracies are more likely to exhibit transparency in government than are substantive democracies

content.answer: all substantive democracies are procedural, but not all procedural democracies are substantive

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
